Expressions: I read 1/10 part of the book.
I called him twenty five times.

Tai-Khamti: mən mumuŋ si ənnɑe nəm kinɡɑ

Expressions: Approximately 20 kilos of rice are in the sack.
Tai-Khamti: muʈɑ-muʈɑ šɑo kilo kʰɑosɑn bostɑ mei eŋ sɑ

Expressions: Approximately 50% of students are attending the workshop.
Approximately  fifteen kilos of rice are in the sack.
Tai-Khamti: muʈɑ-muʈɑ šipʰɑ kilo kʰɑosɑn bostɑ mei jəŋ sɑ
muʈɑ moʈi skul nei hiŋ ləŋ ləkʰɑ jəŋ sɑ

Expressions: Approximately 35 kilos of rice are in the sack.
Tai-Khamti: muʈɑ-muʈɑ sɔmšipʰɑ kilo kʰɑosɑn bostɑ mei jəŋ sɑ

Expressions: A group of two girls played.
A group of five girls played.
A group of four girls played.
A group of twelve boys reached.
A group of twenty five boys reached.
A group of twenty boys reached.
A single word comes to mind.
Pair of socks are lying here
Tai-Khamti: ʈʰoŋtin kɔne pun məi əʋəi susɑ

Expressions: I went there dozen of times.
I bought half a dozen eggs.
Tai-Khamti: kou ɖəzən/ɑdʰɑ dərǰən kʰəi si mɑ ɡəsɑ

Expressions: wait for a couple of minutes
